befriend.long: Main Action. A Ranger may attempt to Befriend a neutral or uncontrolled creature they are trained to interact with (based on Monster Type). Target must be in base contact. Make an opposed Quality check: both Ranger and creature roll a number of dice equal to their current Quality; each 4+ is a success. If the Ranger scores more successes, the creature becomes Befriended. If the creature scores more successes, the attempt fails with no effect. On a tie, the creature becomes Wary. Befriended creatures will not attack Rangers and may be escorted within 6". Befriended creatures never fight for Rangers unless explicitly stated.

befriend_any.long: Passive. This unit may attempt Befriend actions against any monster type unless restricted by scenario rules.

befriend_automat.long: Passive. May attempt Befriend actions against Automat constructs. Success enables control or neutrality per scenario rules.

befriend_beast.long: Passive. May attempt Befriend actions against living monsters of flesh, tooth, and claw. Successful Befriend prevents hostility per scenario rules.

befriend_bloodless.long: Passive. May attempt Befriend actions against Bloodless (undead). Successful Befriend alters hostility per scenario rules.

befriend_spirits.long: Passive. May attempt Befriend actions against incorporeal undead such as Ghosts, Haunts, Wraiths, and similar Spirit-class Bloodless. Does not apply to physical undead bodies.

befriend_kaiju.long: Passive. May attempt Befriend actions against Titan-class Kaiju monsters. Success calms, redirects, or suppresses rampage behavior per scenario rules.

repair.long: Main Action. If this unit has Spare Parts available, it may restore 1 damage to an adjacent friendly vehicle, device, or mechanical unit. This consumes 1 use of Spare Parts. Can also change state from Broken to Functional if applicable.

blood_transfusion.long: Main Action. An adjacent friendly unit gains +1 Quality (to a maximum of its starting Quality). This unit immediately loses 1 Quality.

vitagood_brew.long: Main Action. Once per game. This unit or an adjacent ally immediately restores 1 lost Quality and removes Suppression or Stagger or Venom.

cargo_hold.long: Passive. May transport up to 4 Rangers OR 1 medium Monster OR 2 objectives. Load/unload requires base contact and one activation.

purification_ritual.long: Main Action. Once per game. Remove all negative terrain traits (Hazardous, Tainted, Haunted, Burning, Choking) from 12" radius.

forbidden_knowledge.long: Passive. Friendly units within 12" gain +1 die when attempting Befriend actions against chosen monster type (declared at start of game).

formulae_master.long: Passive. Friendly Conjure Guard units within 12" extend range/area of their abilities by +6" or +3" radius.

kaiju_calming_ritual.long: Main Action. Two-turn ritual. Round 1: Position within 6" of rampaging Kaiju and begin ritual. Round 2: Complete ritual with Quality test. Success: Kaiju is calmed and may be Befriended or redirected. Grant +3 VP for successful calming.

yokai_knowledge.long: Passive. Friendly units within 6" gain +1 die when attacking or defending against Titan-type units.

fortuna_charms.long: Passive. At start of game, create 3 Fortuna Charm tokens. Any friendly unit within 12" may spend 1 token to reroll any single die roll. Tokens are consumed when used.

third_eye_vision.long: Passive. This unit can see Stealth units and reveal Hidden units within 12". Ignores Fog and Smoke for targeting purposes.

mind_control.long: Main Action. Ranged attack at 12". If attack succeeds with 2+ successes over Defense, control target's next activation (choose their actions).

haunt_candy.long: Passive. At start of game, create 3 Haunt Candy tokens. May spend tokens for: (1) +1 die to Befriend Bloodless, (2) Restore 1 Quality to Bloodless ally, or (3) Reroll failed Befriend attempt.

relic_bearer.long: Passive. This unit carries one sacred Conjure Guard relic. Choose relic at army creation. Each relic has a once-per-game powerful effect.

calamity_parade.long: Main Action. Once per game. All friendly units within 6" gain: +3" Move, +1 Quality, and Fearless until end of round. Inspiring battlefield moment.

radiomancer_jam.long: Main Action. Range 24". Target enemy tech-based hero (Jager, Hexan, Iron Diplomat, etc.) cannot use special abilities next activation. Radio disruption effect.

assistant.long: Passive. May assist adjacent Mystic or Scientist with special activations.

field_patch_job.long: Main Action. Adjacent DEVICE or VEHICLE regains 2 Quality (once per activation). Requires Spare Parts, which are consumed.

kick_the_machine.long: Main Action. Adjacent friendly unit: Remove one debuff (Hex, Stagger, Suppression, Pinned).

signal_orders.long: Main Action. Once per activation: One friendly unit within 12" may immediately move 3".

sonic_nullifier.long: Passive. Enemy units within 6" cannot use Hex, Charm, or other Mystic special abilities.

steal.long: Main Action. May use Interact action in base contact with enemy unit to attempt theft. On success, choose one: remove one non-Titan upgrade from target (upgrade is destroyed), steal 1 carried resource/token, or apply -1 Defense to target until end of round.

brain_bloom.long: Main Action. Ranged mind attack that ignores cover bonuses. Apply Morale pressure first where applicable.

binding_rig.long: Passive. On successful Grapple vs Brute or Monster type: target becomes Restrained (cannot move or attack until adjacent ally breaks restraints or this unit dies).

sonderbar_injection.long: Main Action. Once per game, with adjacent Chemist Lackey, inject a Plugugly. Roll 1d6: 3-6 grants +2 Quality +1 Defense permanently, 1-2 transforms into enemy Sonderbar Ghoul.

mismanaged_asset.long: Passive. If this unit is destroyed before Round 4, your faction loses 5 Victory Points.

anchor.long: Passive. Cannot be moved by enemy abilities or effects. Ignores knockback and displacement.

sovereign_presence.short: Projects an aura of absolute command.
sovereign_presence.long: Passive. While this unit is on the table, all friendly units within 18" automatically pass any morale checks caused by enemy abilities.

unquestioned_rule.long: Passive. Enemy units within 6" of this model cannot take Reaction actions or use triggered defensive abilities.

hierarchy_of_flesh.short: Sacrifice nearby grunts to ignore damage.
hierarchy_of_flesh.long: Passive. Once per round, when this model takes damage, you may instead remove one friendly Grunt within 3". The damage to the Queen is negated.

crown_of_unanswered_law.long: Main Action. The Queen declares her law. Change the current Canyon State to 'Exalted' regardless of current conditions. This lasts until the end of the next round.

veiled_whispers.short: Confuse enemies; -1 Quality for adjacent foes.
veiled_whispers.long: Passive. Enemy units in base contact with this model suffer -1 Quality as they are distracted by the court's constant, unsettling murmurs.

ritual_comfort.short: Remove Strain from a Hero or Elite.
ritual_comfort.long: Main Action. Remove 1 Strain from a friendly Hero or Elite unit in base contact.

deploy_demesne_marker.short: Place a marker to expand Consecrated Ground.
deploy_demesne_marker.long: Main Action. Place a Demesne Marker within 3". This marker generates a 6" radius of Consecrated Ground. Markers can be destroyed by enemy Interact actions.
